mapper.insert: insert into comments(explorer_no, post_no, content) values(#{explorerNo}, #{postNo}, #{content})
mapper.select: select c.no no, c.explorer_no explorerNo, c.post_no postNo, c.content content, e.nickname nickname, e.profile profile, c.regdate regdate from comments c left join explorers e on c.explorer_no = e.no where c.no=#{no}
